description:
Summer is blazing in Neo-Venezia. The days are so hot that Akari is starting to see things...  One minute, she`s walking down a crowded street, and the next, everyone is gone.  Following President Aria in a haze, Akari wanders into a mysterious cafe, with a very unusual clientele...  And later, the girls all decide to buy Nightshine Chimes, delicate little wind chimes with a glowing bead inside.  The glow only lasts for a month before it fades, so Akari decides to make the most of the time she has.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chasing That Mirage... / The Light from That Nightshine Chime...
Parte I: Inseguendo quel miraggio... - Parte II: Quel campanellino che illumina la notte...
Sono Nigemizu o Otte... / Sono Yakou Rin no Hikari wa...
その 逃げ水を追って... / その 夜光鈴の光は...
